pages.text: Various armor sets exist in the game.

pages.title: Brigandine Armor
pages.text: Steel plated leather armor. Made by combining leather armor and a steel ingot in the smithing table.

pages.title: Diving Armor
pages.text: Armor made from brass. Allows the wearer to hold their breath for a longer period of time.

pages.title: C-P Diving Armor
pages.text: Upgraded diving armor. Provides the wearer with conduit power when in water.
